page.title: 16BENTWORTH HOME SURVEY cont.
page.content:
by Andrew & Jonathan.
HOME LIFE LOCAL HISTORY Lots of the houses in Bentworth are less than 50 years old.Between 50 and 200 years ago not many houses were built.Over 200 years ago many more houses were built.One house is Tudor style and Hall Farm is medieval. We found out that brick is the most popular building material by a long way.Flint in Bentworth is the second most popular building material because Bentworth is on flint.Tile hung and rendered,although they look nice there very few in Bentworth.There is one stone house and one pebbledashed. Most houses in Bentworth have a name such as Hunters End,Hookers Place,The White House,Hunts Cottage and Strawtop .
